Life hack: how to quickly hang a flower pot with a rope
03 Nov 2019 by Victor Podvolotsky
Even a clothesline would do.
There are a lot of ways to hang a flower pot from the ceiling or hook on the wall. The easiest one is to buy a special planter with ready-made slings and eyelet. If you want to do without extra expenses, a reliable strapping for the pot can be done independently.



This method is suitable for almost any round-shaped vessel. Even a clothesline would do. The main thing is to calculate with the length. The larger it is, the lower the pot will hang.
